lyrics:
Everything has a beginning
Everything comes to an end
Take it or leave it
You'd better believe it
Be my lover, be my friend
Try to deny what you're feeling
and you know that your heart will say no
Love will last longer
Growing stronger and stronger
If you stay and don't let go
Oh-oh
Out of the light
Like a star, like a hero
Love will survive
Oh-oh
Taking a fight is the life of a hero
Staying alive
This is a story of love and compassion
Only heroes can tell
Oh-oh
Out of the light
Like a star, like a hero
Love will survive
Heaven and earth keep colliding
But we love on a world of its own
Oh, there you can't fake it
Just make it or break it
Only you can find the one
Oh-oh
Out of the light
Like a star, like a hero
Love will survive
Oh-oh
Taking a fight is the life of a hero
Staying alive
This is a story of love and compassion
Only heroes can tell
Oh-oh
Out of the light
Like a star, like a hero
Love will survive
Ooh-ooh survive
Heroes can live on their own
But heroes never die alone
Oh-oh
Out of the light
Like a star, like a hero
Love will survive
Oh-oh
Taking a fight is the life of a hero
Staying alive
This is a story of love and compassion
Only heroes can tell
Oh-oh

Like a star, like a hero
Love will survive
